rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 27 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:17 AM, 22 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Quezon, Laguna and Cavite within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bataan(Mariveles, Limay, Bagac, Orion), Zambales(Subic, San Antonio, Olongapo) and Batangas(Calatagan, Balayan) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
